title: ain't & can't
content:
can't = can + not

ain't = be + not / have + not

 

ain't 是<has not, have not> <am not, is not, are not> 的缩写. 非正式语. 常用双否定.
    
    I ain't done nothing = I have not done anything
    we ain't got no apples = we have not got any apples(we do not have any apples)
    He ain't got a car = He have not got a car(He does not have a car)
    That ain't no slingshot, that's whole crossbow!
